While this review is in progress, I will think of maybe adding a "poison pill" event that kills the execution. This should allow to keep running this in pre-commit, once ROS-streaming is enabled it will rely on longer timeouts and run in post-commit (since I don't have access to the actual tests).
This is superseded by #1946 which ports the schema to proto and updates it.
LGTM. Thank you @yk5
Thanks @XuMingmin; much appreciated!

Thank you @aviemzur. I assume you tested with `mvn clean install -DskipTests`. LGTM.

@dhalperi do you have comments?
Tried it, LGTM. @aaltay  can you please merge?
LGTM
Thanks!

For the record, I would mention `-Dquick` in the `README.md` and also propose a pull request for website.

After this PR I plan to remove force streaming. It was necessary since streaming/batch was decided based on Source type, but with `Pipeline#replaceTransform` I could replace any `Read.Bounded` with an adapted `Read.Unbounded` if `options.isStreaming()`. So the pom we'd be good as it is now.
Like I told you a few day ago, I plan to entirely separate batch/streaming because it appears that Spark doesn't support Flattening of RDDs (bounded) and DStreams (Unbounded) in a resilient manner.
Yes, it makes sense to remove force streaming.
Yup, was born in sin

Run Dataflow RunnableOnService

I read this thread https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/48383f94a0ec3f5bae6276d77f9826ee7676ac24273e3b74ec792fe1@%3Cdev.beam.apache.org%3E as building a consensus that checks should be *off* by default, and relesae profile should be opt in. It seems like the following people were in favor of that:

* [Aljoscha](https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/da9295b8093a02528a893c3fa3578627e758ee897d3ed6ef548fa3e5@%3Cdev.beam.apache.org%3E)
* [Dan](https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/02ffc8a36a545ad89e32fafe2cc33728787e968ececb86a0e1f09b0e@%3Cdev.beam.apache.org%3E)
* [Davor](https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/caa37984f8ff8b2c27951ec1e727db9872fb3a293f43545a13575adc@%3Cdev.beam.apache.org%3E)
* [Kenn](https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/775a2c504dd7b5c4bd3a81fa1a120e13ac53eba42225195f75ac15b2@%3Cdev.beam.apache.org%3E)
* [JB (weak)](https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/0d090dec47899e47a6bbed1804a0d8791e17f7bc73d86b3aa0733ab3@%3Cdev.beam.apache.org%3E)

and the following people wanted to change as this proposal:

* [Aviem](https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/ff1914c840c43232982e5c42c9e22a8c035e0a3402fa7235858ff494@%3Cdev.beam.apache.org%3E)
* [Robert](https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/bccc73fc5b6b2b1d516fe60b569ac4925a593e5bdaa77fb1b2690792@%3Cdev.beam.apache.org%3E)

That I believe is everyone who rang into the specific discussion on-or-around Feb 10.

So in other words, I think this PR is mostly against the will of the community.
